activities.name: Copy file blob to data lake

ifFalseActivities.name: fail if file size not expected

ifTrueActivities.name: Copy file blob to data lake_copy1

activities.name: copy the file from https to data lake
copy the file from https to data lake_copy1
Copy cases death from ds db

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(LastModifytime) as NewWatermarkvalue from data_source_table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from data_source_table where LastModifytime > 
'@{activity('LookupOldWaterMark').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and 
LastModifytime <= '@{activity('Lookupmaxdate').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

sources.name: AzureSqlTable1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSqlTable1
